verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Behold, I am the Lord, the God of all flesh
Is there anything? Is there anything? Too hard for me?
Is there anything, anything, anything,
Too hard for thee?
(Repeat last two lines)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Behold, You are the Lord, The God of all flesh
There is nothing! There is nothing! too hard for thee.
There is nothing, nothing, nothing,
Too hard for thee.
(Repeat last two lines)
